text: The Freeze-Out is a 1921 American western movie directed by John Ford and starring Harry Carey, Helen Ferguson, Joe Harris, Charles Le Moyne. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1921 movies Category:1920s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Freeze-Out
